name: visit_While
code:
def visit_While(self, node, while_name=None):
    """ID: b4548824-2379-4d34-9e71-554bf00450c7"""
    self.name_stack.append(while_name)
    self.method_stack.append(while_name)
    for stmt in node.body:
        self.visit(stmt)
    self.method_stack.pop()
    self.name_stack.pop()
